Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to requiring the chair and commissioners of the state liquor authority to file certain disclosures
Summary: Requires the chair and commissioners of the state liquor authority to file an annual statement of financial disclosure pursuant to section seventy-three-a of the public officers law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to requiring the chair and commissioners of the state liquor authority to file certain disclosures
